price: 你看他们怎样为你打了许多譬喻，而他们自己误入歧途，故不能获得一条正路。
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
